title: Public Health (Notifiable Infectious Disease) (Declaration) Notice, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 93
Gazette dated Friday, 13th March, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 21 of 2020
The Public Health Act
(Laws, Volume 17, Cap. 295)
The Public Health (Notifiable Infectious Disease)
(Declaration) Notice, 2020
In exercise of the powers contained in sections 9 and 28 of the
Public Health Act, the following Notice is issued:
1.' This Notice may be cited as the Public Health (Notifiable
Title
Infectious Disease) (Declaration) Notice, 2020.
2. The disease specified in the Schedule is declared a notifiable
Declaration
infectious disease. of notifiable
infectious
disease
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph 2)
Coronavirus Disease 2019
Dr C. Chilufya,
Lusaka Minister of Health
13th March, 2020
[mh. 101/22/25]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtainedfrom the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136. 1010!. Lusaka, Price K4,QQ mc/i
